Snippet.Use Case: Lock the Requirement Scope of a Release
Snippet.Example: The native 'Assign to Release' and 'Assign to Cycle' actions are disabled and replaced by a special VERA action.
Comments: Disable the 'Edit Link' action for requirements to releases.
To do this in the standard VERA Records Management Policy:
1) delete the rule that allows Requirement Authors, Requirement Managers, and Release Managers to do this.
2) add an enhanced error message (description) to the rule that prevents everyone from editing the release link
Add the special 'Assign to Release(s)' action to the actions list.

Execution Rules.Description: This action is disabled.  Please use the 'Assign to Release(s)' action in the VERA Action Menu instead.
